title: Deciphering Tadej Pogačar’s Race Program: The Vuelta? Definitely, Maybe. Paris-Roubaix? ‘A Little Maybe’
content:
UAE boss Mauro Gianetti confirms Tour de France-Vuelta a España program likely on the cards for 2025: 'Normally this is the plan.'

Read the full article at Deciphering Tadej Pogačar’s Race Program: The Vuelta? Definitely, Maybe. Paris-Roubaix? ‘A Little Maybe’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
